alert.note: Alert for Sullivan (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 09 at 6:00PM EDT until September 09 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Pennsylvania, including the following county, Sullivan. * WHEN...Until 800 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 558 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall of 0.5 to 1 inches is expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Ricketts Glen State Park, Muncy Valley, Dushore, Laporte and Eagles Mere. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
